DSMscenario 1.0
  • Reference
  • News

Theoretical Maximum Habitat

max_habitat.Rd

A list for each species containing an ordered vector of the maximum possible suitable area for each watershed

max_spawn_area

max_rear_area

Details

Suitable habitat modeling captures degraded existing habitat conditions. For the purposes of scenario development, we assumed that existing maximum habitat (which occurs at the most suitable flow conditions in the watershed) can be increased by a maximum of 100 feasibility of habitat restoration over twenty years as well as physical limitations (e.g. homes, levees, bridges, etc.) on habitat conditions.

Examples

# Subset by run to find max spawn and rear habitat area
DSMscenario::max_spawn_area$FALL
